DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study External Institution  Referral Organizational Unit Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Name of external organization that provided a referral to the clinical research study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study External Referral Organizational Unit Institution
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface._Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services._Organizational unit like a laboratory, institute or consortium._An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Property.preferredDefinition: Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface.:Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services.:Organizational unit like a laboratory, institute or consortium.:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.

Concepts.definition: Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface.
Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services.
Organizational unit like a laboratory, institute or consortium.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Be specific about something; define clearly.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
